content.rendered:
Oribe hair care products are now available at Luxe Concept Salon, Chatswood.  Don’t live in Sydney? No problem – we are happy to arrange postage to anywhere in Australia.  You can either purchase Oribe via our online shop – or call us to discuss the best product and arrange delivery.

Luxe is one of the first salons in Sydney to carry this Uber luxury hair care range.  Oribe, the eponymous product line from one of the most influential hairdressers of all time, defines luxury in hair care.  Combining over 30 years of styling heritage at the top of the editorial and salon worlds with old-world craftsmanship and cutting-edge innovation from the most sought-after beauty artisans, the Oribe line delivers the highest possible levels of performance and sophistication.

Oribe delivers truly original formulations: gels that condition, oils that hold, sprays that don’t flake or clump, skincare-grade shampoos that prep hair for styling while protecting it from the environment, all lightly scented with specially commissioned French perfumes.  Beautiful in function and form alike, this line is for taste-driven individuals who know that personal style – perfectly expressed through excellence – is the ultimate luxury.

Contact Luxe to learn more about the Oribe hair care range and view the range now.
